topics.title: Algebra
topics.description: Learn the basics of algebra, including variables, equations, and systems of equations.

topics.title: Geometry
topics.description: Discover the world of shapes and their properties, including angles, lines, and polygons.

topics.title: Calculus
topics.description: Take your math skills to the next level with calculus, covering limits, derivatives, and integrals.

topics.title: Grammar
topics.description: Learn the rules of English grammar, including parts of speech, verb tenses, and sentence structure.

topics.title: Reading Comprehension
topics.description: Improve your reading skills by understanding vocabulary, context, and main ideas.

topics.title: Writing
topics.description: Learn the art of writing, including style, organization, and audience.

topics.title: Cell Biology
topics.description: Learn about the basic structure and function of cells, including cell membranes, organelles, and the cytoskeleton.

topics.title: Genetics
topics.description: Understand the principles of genetics, including DNA, chromosomes, and genetic disorders.

topics.title: Ecology
topics.description: Explore the interactions between organisms and their environment, including ecosystems, food chains, and biomes.

topics.title: Mechanics
topics.description: Learn about the laws of motion, forces, energy, and momentum.

topics.title: Thermodynamics
topics.description: Understand the concepts of temperature, heat, and energy transfer, including the laws of thermodynamics.
